How to Acquire Phantasmal Force

Phantasmal Force can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, The Great Old One Phantasmal Force can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard, Arcane Trickster, Eldritch Knight, The Great Old One

You can use environment effect for more damage. Notes & Tips go here
